ing: 1 (20 ounce) package Green GiantÂ® Mashed Cauliflower - any variety
des: "Simply stir a few ingredients into our rich and creamy Mashed Cauliflower and you have a side dish that takes center stage. This couldn't be easier to make and once you taste it, you might want to keep it all for yourself!"
ins:
Heat Green GiantÂ® Mashed Cauliflower according to package directions.
Stir in hot sauce, butter, blue cheese, and green onion. Drizzle with additional cayenne pepper sauce, if desired.
